Title: The Case of the Missing Herbs
Description:
Aah, $p! There you are!

They took it! They took my Saxifrage!

I left for barely two hours, and when I returned, someone had taken my Saxifrage! All they left to show for their crimes was this heavy sack of gold coins. As if you could put a price on herbs!

...Please $p, I need more Saxifrage to replenish what that criminal took from me.
ObjectivesText: Gather 8 Saxifrage for Agrikus in Valdrakken.
